programme.title: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is brought down by Sasukes Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke is serious about bringing down Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke counters with his Fire Style Jutsu, but Naruto extinguishes the flames easily.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Narutos Nine-Tail chakra seems to move with a will of its own as it counters Sasukes powerful attacks.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The fierce battle with Sasuke leaves Naruto unconscious. Kakashi finally arrives at his side.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke, but Naruto intercepts her.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya search for information in a town in the Land of Rice Paddies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sakura and Sasame are attacked by Kamikiri, Jigumo and Kagero of the Fuma Clan.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya uses his Summoning Jutsu to call out Gamakichi. With Gamakichi leading the way, the shinobi advance up winding stairways and through long tunnels.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura is cornered by Orochimaru! Just as Kabuto is about to hurl his kunai at her, Naruto comes running in.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries to shield Sakura from an attack and is wounded by Kamikiri. Naruto laughs off his injury and counters with his Shadow Clone Jutsu
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto gets upset when Jiraiya sets out on a sudden mission without him. Jiraiya tells him to undergo special training during his absence and hands him a scroll.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shizune pursues Mizuki who has escaped from the Maximum Security Prison but is overcome by him and the brothers Raijin and Fujin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raijin and Fujin possess superhuman strength, and Naruto is no match for them.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Ino and Choji come to the rescue. The three have been sent by Tsunade to assist, allowing Naruto and Pakkun to go after Mizuki.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers that Tsubaki is Mizukis fiance. She has an idea of his whereabouts and asks the squad to take her with them.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Iruka are left in a daze by the power of Mizukis chakra. Naruto counters with a Jutsu but is quickly rebuffed.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kiba, Shino and Hinata have come up with an idea to use the Bikochu beetle to find Sasuke.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Squad 8 and Naruto arrive at the Bikochus habitat. They use a photograph to guide them in their search
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hinata is kidnapped by Suzumebachi and others from the Kamizuru Clan.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba and Shino are pursued and find themselves cornered in the hive of a queen bee.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While training in the Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto rescues three men from the rapids who have come to request a mission.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Only God Forgives, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Only God Forgives reunites the vision of renowned director Nicolas Winding Refn (DRIVE) with Ryan Gosling in a gritty thriller set in the seedy underbelly of Bangkok.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Gentlemen, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A British drug lord tries to sell off his highly profitable empire to a dynasty of Oklahoma billionaires.

programme.title: The Departed, (2006, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Set in Boston, this police thriller follows a gangster who infiltrates the police department and a cop who infiltrates the gang simultaneously. The two find out that a mole exists within the organizations and race to uncover each other's identity.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Honest Thief, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber (Liam Neeson) turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

programme.title: Marlowe, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlowe, a gripping thriller set in 1939 LA. Hard-boiled private eye, Philip Marlowe, is hired to find the lover of a glamorous heiress. Unexpectedly, Marlowe finds himself embroiled in a deadly mystery that he's determined to either solve or die trying.

programme.title: The Grey, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a plane crash leaves him stranded in the Alaskan wilderness, a sharpshooter (Liam Neeson) tries to lead fellow survivors to safety despite forbidding conditions and a pack of ferocious wolves.

programme.title: The Marksman, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: A hardened Arizona rancher tries to protect an 11-year-old migrant boy fleeing from a ruthless drug cartel.

programme.title: Blacklight, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting U.S. citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher, (2011, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing, biker, tough guy who found God and becomes a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

programme.title: Everybody's Fine, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: When Frank Goode's (Robert DeNiro) children cancel a family reunion, the widower sets off on a cross-country journey to reconnect with them. Expecting to share in the joys of their happy lives, his visits reveal a picture that's far from perfect.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido's banquet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaidos Banquet!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thinking of Otama! Luffys Furious Strike!

programme.title: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!

programme.title: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido's castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom's children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!

programme.title: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaidos Son!

programme.title: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido's son Yamato's motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy's punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamatos Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamatos Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffys All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ill Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Odens Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Wont Forgive Him! Choppers Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasakis Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Choppers Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamatos Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marcos Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: As a result of a new medical technique, an agent is able to surgically take on the identical appearance of a criminal in order to take down his terrorist organization.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Gattaca, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Brightburn, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Bells Of Capistrano, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: A feud between rodeo companies accelerates when both want Gene Autry, as a crowd-drawing added attraction. This film features Gene singing five hits, including "In Old Capistrano" and "Forgive Me."

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry leads cattlemen in rebellion when a packing company rep cheats them. A gals future depends on the company's radio spots for her show! It gets exciting when the owner appears incognito.

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Ritchie.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, (2016, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Stuck in a rut, reporter Kim Baker decides to shake things up by taking a dangerous assignment in Afghanistan. Far from home and completely out of her comfort zone, Kim discovers her true strength as she risks it all to find the next big story.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.desc: Um membro do jri une foras com um "consultor" que tenta manipular o resultado do julgamento.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: O Espetacular Homem-Aranha
programme.desc: Peter Parker se torna o Homem-Aranha e equilibra ser um super-heri, lutando contra o vilo Lagarto, com o seu relacionamento em desenvolvimento com Gwen Stacy.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Os Reis da Rua
programme.desc: Um policial veterano vai contra cultura policial da qual fez parte a sua carreira inteira.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: H 20 anos, um trgico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversrio da tragdia, o nico sobrevivente volta cidade em busca de uma vingana sangrenta.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotrio da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em srie passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano
programme.desc: Patrick Bateman um yuppie de Wall Street, obcecado com sucesso, status, estilo, com uma noiva deslumbrante. Ele tambm um assassino psictico que estupra, mata e desmembra estranhos e conhecidos sem provocao ou propsito.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo
programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Loucos Por Dinheiro
programme.desc: Diretor de presdio obriga dois homens a se casarem com suas filhas, por acreditar que elas estejam grvidas. Os novos cunhados decidem roubar um trem e fugir. Enquanto isso, uma agente do FBI chega cidade para investigar a morte de um prisioneiro.

programme.title: Deus nos Acuda!
programme.desc: Entrega especial para fs de comdia! Greg Kinnear (Auto Focus) estrela este filme agradvel dirigido por Garry Marshall (Uma Linda Mulher) sobre um trapaceiro sem nenhum valor que passa a se dar bem.

programme.title: Os Sete Suspeitos
programme.desc: Descubra todos os suspeitos e todas as suas artimanhas. Voc amar presenciar suas atrapalhadas enquanto no nmero de mortes e risadas aumenta perante seus olhos.

programme.title: ESCOLA DE IDIOTAS (2006)
programme.desc: Um jovem azarado se inscreve em um curso para ganhar confiana e ajudar a conquistar a garota dos seus sonhos, mas as coisas se complicam quando o professor tem o mesmo plano.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: O Chamado de Xangai
programme.desc: Um advogado de Nova York enviado a Xangai a negcios e logo enfrenta muitos problemas com a lei.

programme.title: Terapia do Sexo
programme.desc: Um viciado em sexo em recuperao tenta cortejar uma nova namorada que sente a necessidade de expressar sua intensa sexualidade.

programme.title: Como conquistar uma Mulher
programme.desc: Andy Conners no faz ideia de como satisfazer as necessidades sexuais de sua namorada, Lauren Baker. Ele pede conselhos a seus amigos e a uma famosa atriz porno.

programme.title: A Servio de Sara
programme.desc: Sara Moore recebe os papis do divrcio e percebe que corre o risco de perder milhes. Ela convence o oficial de justia Joe Tyler a ajud-la a lidar com seu ex-marido e, para isso, fazem juntos uma viagem pelo pas.

programme.title: Qual seu nmero?
programme.desc: Ally quer encontrar o melhor ex-namorado que j teve com medo de nunca mais amar de verdade.

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva
programme.desc: Um casal tem uma grande surpresa quando sua filha anuncia seu casamento no dia da sua boda de prata.

programme.title: Outono em Nova York
programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquento que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso srio com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que ter com ela outro rpido e fcil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos fcil ou rpido.

programme.title: Uma Viagem Para Paris
programme.desc: Lucas, um rico empresrio francs, vai a Montana para uma proposta de negcio muito atraente. L, ele conhece Robin, se apaixona e a leva para Paris em uma incrvel aventura de Natal. Mas ser que os negcios acabaro com esse romance?

programme.title: Um romance proibido
programme.desc: Um veterano tenta se assimilar de volta vida civil em um pas que ele mal reconhece enquanto tenta conquistar o corao de uma imigrante iraquiana, mas esse romance improvvel posto prova quando ela se depara com a perspectiva de deportao.

programme.title: Festividades do Chocolate Quente
programme.desc: Colette dirige uma cafetaria conhecida pelo seu chocolate quente secreto e famoso. Marcus, um novo dono de sobremesa, comea a atrair os clientes da Colette, ela est determinada a exp-lo.

programme.title: Amor rio acima
programme.desc: Charlotte, autora de Chicago, viaja para a regio selvagem de Minnesota para escrever um novo livro. Seu guia, Rob, duvida das habilidades de Charlotte. No entanto, eles percebem que tm mais coisas em comum e acabam se apaixonando.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar antiga.

programme.title: Lar Doce Lar ... Ou no
programme.desc: Victoria Tremont, entediada com a vida, quer encontrar algum especial. Um estranho entra na cafeteria e no responde ao seu charme. Ela descobre que ele dirige um ministrio de moradias e decide se voluntariar, mesmo que precise mentir.

programme.title: A Grande Guerra
programme.desc: Durante os ltimos dias da Primeira Guerra Mundial, um grupo de soldados dos EUA enviado para trs das linhas inimigas para resgatar um peloto perdido.

programme.title: Promessas de Guerra
programme.desc: Joshua Connor perdeu seus trs filhos na batalha de Galpoli, em 1919. Ele recebe ento a ajuda de Ayshe, uma mulher que est espera do marido, enviado para aguerra, e de seu filho, o pequeno Orhan.

programme.title: Premonies
programme.desc: Linda Hanson uma mulher suburbana que um dia avisada que seu marido, Jim, morreu em um terrvel desastre automobilstico. Porm, ao acordar no dia seguinte, tudo est perfeitamente normal em sua vida e Jim est vivo.

programme.title: O ltimo Guarda-Costas
programme.desc: O gngster Mitchell decide mudar de profisso ao sair da priso e abandonar o mundo do crime. Ele contratado como segurana de Charlotte, uma complicada jovem atriz que tenta levar uma vida reclusa.

programme.title: Tormenta
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: O Duelo
programme.desc: Um Ranger do Texas est investigando uma srie de mortes inexplicveis em uma cidade chamada Helena.
